com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.utils

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.utils.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Validator allows implementing classes to run validation checks and gather all errors.

      Checks if there are any validation errors and if yes throws IllegalStateException.

      • addValidationError

        public void addValidationError(java.lang.String errorMessage)

      • checkValidationErrors

        public void checkValidationErrors(java.lang.String prologue,
                                  java.util.function.Consumer<Validator> validationFunction)
        Checks if there are any validation errors and if yes throws IllegalStateException.
        Parameters:
        prologue - A prologue before the errors list.
        validationFunction - Validation function that defines all check conditions.

      • require

        public final void require(boolean condition,
                          java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Checks if required condition is true and if not adds the given error message to the list.
        Parameters:
        condition - The condition to be met.
        errorMessage - The error message in case condition is not met.
